001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequest;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestDraft;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestDraftBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestUpdate;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsPost post(QuoteRequestDraft quoteRequestDraft);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsByIDPost update(Versioned<QuoteRequest> quoteRequest,
021            List<QuoteRequestUpdateAction> actions) {
022        return withId(quoteRequest.getId())
023                .post(builder -> QuoteRequestUpdate.builder().version(quoteRequest.getVersion()).actions(actions));
024    }
025
026    public default ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsByIDPost update(Versioned<QuoteRequest> quoteRequest,
027            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<QuoteRequestUpdateAction, QuoteRequestUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
028        return withId(quoteRequest.getId()).post(builder -> QuoteRequestUpdate.builder()
029                .version(quoteRequest.getVersion())
030                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(QuoteRequestUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
031    }
032
033    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<QuoteRequestUpdateAction, QuoteRequestUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsByIDPost> update(
034            Versioned<QuoteRequest> quoteRequest) {
035        return builder -> withId(quoteRequest.getId()).post(b -> QuoteRequestUpdate.builder()
036                .version(quoteRequest.getVersion())
037                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(QuoteRequestUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
038    }
039
040    public default ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<QuoteRequest> quoteRequest) {
041        return withId(quoteRequest.getId()).delete().withVersion(quoteRequest.getVersion());
042    }
043
044    public default ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsPost create(QuoteRequestDraft quoteRequestDraft) {
045        return post(quoteRequestDraft);
046    }
047
048    public default ByProjectKeyQuoteRequestsPost create(UnaryOperator<QuoteRequestDraftBuilder> op) {
049        return post(op.apply(QuoteRequestDraftBuilder.of()).build());
050    }
051}
